sn34.46-49:4.3: samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo …
sn34.46-49:4.4: neva samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo …
sn34.46-49:4.5: samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca …
sn34.46-49:4.6: seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṃ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṃ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34.46-49:4.7: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṃ jhāyī samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ abhinīhārakusalo ca ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ … pe …
sn34.46-49:5.1: “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī … pe ….
sn34.46-49:6.1: “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī … pe ….
sn34.46-49:7.1: “Samādhismiṃ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī … pe ….
